title: DOUBLE MYSTERY GIFTING?
body: Where is the option to gift double mystery gifting? Is it the green one or the gold one . . . .and will that give them two skin chances instead of one? I don't see an option for the double one . . . so I am assuming they just get it when I gift them.

replies.body:
Hey there Arachne,

There's no option to double mystery gift a player from what I can tell. From what I can gather, I think you're referring to the Zombie Slayer promo page. The Mystery Gifting portion of the promo doesn't double your mystery gifts, but doubles the chance to gift a Legacy Skin. You'll still only send one skin.

As such, it means that if you Mystery Gift a skin to one of your friends, there will be a higher chance that it'll be one of the legacy skins listed on the promo page. I hope that clears it up!
